name: Cheers
long_description: Cheers is the super-app for field service businesses. We turn every employee interaction into an opportunity for real-time feedback, on-the-spot payments, and actionable insights—without the need for clunky legacy systems. Managers gain a data-rich, unified view of their workforce, helping them optimize operations and drive performance. We’re now generating over $10k in monthly recurring revenue and have secured our first enterprise client, Vivint Smart Home.
one_liner: The super-app for field service businesses
